Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ndithudi tinavumbulutsa ilo mu usiku wamphamvu
Kodi ndi chiyani chimene chingakuuzeni kuti mudziwe kuti usiku wamphamvu ndi otani
Usiku wamphamvu ndi wabwino kuposa miyezi chikwi chimodzi
Mu usiku umenewu Angelo ndi Mzimu, ndi chilolezo cha Mulungu, amachoka kumwamba ndi kutsika pansi ndi malamulo ake onse
